# <a name="import-contacts"></a><span data-ttu-id="69c6d-102">导入联系人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-102">Import contacts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69c6d-103">在将联系人导入到 web 上的 Outlook 之前, 你需要将其从其他电子邮件提供商导出为 .csv 文件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-103">Before importing contacts to Outlook on the web, you'll need to export them from your other email provider as a .csv file.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69c6d-104">然后, 按照下面的说明进行操作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-104">Then, follow the instructions below.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="69c6d-105">在页面底部, 选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-105">At the bottom of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="69c6d-106">**人员**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-106">**People**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="69c6d-107">在工具栏上, 选择 "**管理** > **导入联系人**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-107">On the toolbar, select **Manage** > **Import contacts**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="69c6d-108">选择 "**浏览**", 选择您的 CSV 文件, 然后选择 "**打开**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-108">Select **Browse**, choose your CSV file, and then select **Open**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="69c6d-109">选择“**导入**”。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-109">Select **Import**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69c6d-110">若要了解详细信息, 请参阅[将联系人导入到 Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/bb796340-b58a-46c1-90c7-b549b8f3c5f8#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69c6d-110">To learn more, see [Import contacts to Outlook](https://support.office.com/article/bb796340-b58a-46c1-90c7-b549b8f3c5f8#ID0EAACAAA=Outlook_on_the_web).</span></span>
